channel.title: Transparent login box? :O
channel.description:
hi i want to make a transparent login box, like lets say its blue but its easily transparent, like the 562 command box, except more transparent than that, can someone tell me how?
*edit* i tried to just take out the login box, but it gets all glitchty and when u log out and try another account, the last accounts name and stuff still stays, so if someone could tell me how to make a transparent one, that would be nice
